title: Classic Tobacco Nicotine Pouches By 77
description: TRY 77 CLASSIC TOBACCO NICOTINE POUCHES Classic Tobacco nicotine pouches by 77 is a nicotine pouch with a classic taste of tobacco and without containing a single trace of tobacco. The flavour is rich, spicy and has a velvety aftertaste, a perfect choice for a tobacco connoisseur that is tired discolouring their teeth. View all 77 Pouches View all Tobacco Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 20MG Per Gram | 13MG Per Pouch Classic Tobacco flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT TOBACCO FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES The mature and earthy flavours of the rich tobacco really take centre stage, providing you with an authentic nicotine experience. If you're a former smoker who craves the taste of tobacco, these pouches are perfect for you. MORE ABOUT 77 NICOTINE POUCHES 77 were the first polish brand of tobacco-free nicotine pouches. 77 offers one of the most diverse ranges of flavour on the market, 77 also hit the sweet spot with their nicotine levels. Switch up, switch down, mix and match â€“ do whatever suits you best! Flavours range from different types of mint to peach, apple, strawberries, and even classic tobacco.
